channel.description: The Game.Draw(Game.Update(GameTime gameTime) method is a another hook, this one for adding your gameâ€™s rendering code. By overriding this method, and adding your own rendering code, you fulfill the draw step of the game loop. MonoGame uses the graphics hardware to render the scene, along with double buffering. Thus, when we render, we are drawing into a back buffer, and once that drawing is complete, we flip the buffers so that the one we just finished is what ends up being rendered on-screen, and we now can start drawing into the next back buffer.
